concept.title: Using an HTTP or HTTPS Proxy Server
concept.shortdesc: You can configure each registered to use an authenticated HTTP or HTTPS proxy server for outbound requests made to . Define the proxy properties in the SDC_JAVA_OPTS environment variable in the environment configuration file located in the $SDC_DIST/libexec directory.

conbody.note:
Oracle JDK disabled HTTP proxy authentication for HTTPS URLs in JDK 8 update 111. If runs on a machine with Java 8u111 or later, consider using an HTTPS proxy server. Or as a workaround, consider adding the following Java property to the SDC_JAVA_OPTS environment variable, setting the property to an empty string:
-Djdk.http.auth.tunneling.disabledSchemes=''
However, use this workaround with caution since it exposes credentials by sending them through an unencrypted proxy.
